Position: Software Developer / Java 

Responsibilities
- Further development and optimisation of the software infrastructure
- Requirements analysis, design and implementation of new features
- Backend development with JEE (Java 9 and 11)
- Expansion of our automated release process (continuous integration) and quality assurance (unit testing)
- Searching for and implementing own tasks

Skills
- Degree in computer science or comparable field of study
- Passion for the field
- At least 1 year of development experience with Java
- Experience with multi-threading and design patterns
- Joy at problem solving, analytical approaches, proactive contribution of new ideas
- Joy at learning, further education and professional exchange and working together on projects
- Good (technical) English

Would be plus to have
Development experience with Kotlin
Experience with microservices environment (Docker, Maven, Jenkins)
Further knowledge of our stack 

Status Quo

Java 11
Communication: YouTrack, work with agile methods
IDE: Eclipse (RCP als as framework) bzw. IntelliJ
CD: Jenkins
Framework: up to you, we use Spring 

Working Conditions
- flexibility in working hours
- VIP membership at FIT/ONE (incl. wellness, personal trainer and drinks) and 1000 euros allowance for a bicycle
- 10% learning time of the weekly working time after passing the probationary period
- use of state-of-the-art technologies (Java 11, etc.) and room for new solutions
- events with colleagues from project success to summer party
- attractive remuneration package with bonus payments for above-average contributions to the company's success
- day-care allowance and extra week of holiday when you get married
- short decision-making processes, open-door policy and flat hierarchy structure

StudyFree is a rapidly growing edtech startup looking to democratize international education. We‚Äôre hiring a Product Manager to join our passionate team and lead the charge in delivering compelling and scalable products to support our continued growth

StudyFree is an online platform that connects students with international opportunities worldwide. We‚Äôve gone through top US acceleration programs (Techstars), won several startup competitions.

As Product Manager, you will be responsible for developing a recommendation system for a student's personal development across multiple dimensions: education, career, languages, courses, short term programs. Looking for Interaction Designer!

StudyFree is a rapidly growing online platform that connects students with international opportunities worldwide. We guide students along the entire application process from applying for a program to securing a scholarship and finally migrating. 50,000 students in 108 countries around the world use StudyFree and we are growing fast! Therefore, we are looking for an Interaction Designer who is excited about designing products that our thousands of customers are waiting for.

Our website: https://international.studyfree.org/

As Interaction Designer, you are playing an important role in defining and designing new services that fulfill our students‚Äô needs. You are a user centered thinker: you achieve your goals by always putting the user first in any design decision. Ideally, you had a UX design role before with a focus on fast growing digital services.

Responsibilities
You will be mostly designing digital services that help students find the best matching programmes and guide them all the way towards enrollment. Your responsibilities include:

- Interaction Design: producing high quality user flows, wireframes and prototypes that are aligned with the customer‚Äôs interest.
- User Research: understand our users, identify their needs and make it transparent by performing activities like customer journey mapping.

Qualifications
- 5+ years of relevant experience in Interaction Design
- Proven track record in digital design and a portfolio that supports it
- Great communication skills; able to convey design ideas, supported by wireframes and prototypes
- Knowledge of key product performance metrics, and commitment to grow them
- Strong analytical skills and proven ability to work in a hypothesis and experiment driven environment
- Fluent in written & oral English

This is a full-time remote role. Work schedule is flexible as you‚Äôll work with a team in many different time zones (Mainly Central Europe and Moscow time zone).

To apply, email your resume and cover letter to
slava.emelianov@studyfree.org or telegram @slava_studyfree

Looking for Product Manager!

StudyFree is a rapidly growing edtech startup looking to democratize international education. We‚Äôre looking to hire a  Product Manager to join a passionate team and lead the charge in delivering compelling, scalable products to support our continued growth.

StudyFree is an online that connects students with international opportunities worldwide. We guide students along the entire application process from applying to a program to securing a scholarship and finally immigrating**. 50,000 students in 108 countries** around the world use StudyFree and we just finished going through the TechStars NYC and Berkley StyDeck accelerators.

Our website: https://international.studyfree.org/)

As Product Manager, you are responsible for defining new product solutions and introducing them into new markets. It‚Äôs your goal to deliver great value to our customers and increase adoption. As a customer focused and strategic thinker, you achieve your goals by following an analytical and experimental approach. Ideally, you have a proven track record of introducing and scaling new products successfully.

Responsibilities
Your focus will be mostly on building services that help students find the best matching programmes and guide them all the way towards enrollment. Your responsibilities include:

- Product Innovation: understand the market, learn from our users and internal stakeholders for defining new solutions
- Strategy: defining an overall strategy for improving current and introducing new products to our users.
- Execution: coordinate building new solutions with the development team, measure the impact on our service and adapt your roadmap based on what you learn.

Qualifications
- 5+ years of relevant experience in product management in consumer companies
- Knowledge of key product performance metrics, proven track record of scaling and improving them
- Experience building a digital product in a fast paced environment and managing it through the entire life cycle
- Comfortable with ambiguity and uncertainty as well as evolving requirements as we learn more about market needs

- Strong analytical skills and proven ability to work in a hypothesis and experiment driven environment
- Excellent communication skills to make complex topics accessible at all levels of the organisation
- Capable and eager to work in a cross-functional team (engineers, UX, commercial) from strategy through to delivery
- Fluent in written & oral English

This is a full-time remote role. Work schedule is flexible as you‚Äôll work with a team in many different time zones (Mainly Central Europe and Moscow time zone).

To apply, email your resume and cover letter to
slava.emelianov@studyfree.org or telegram @slava_studyfree

We are looking for smart, creative C++ developers with a solid theoretical background. They will work largely independently and will be responsible for the whole range of activities when implementing a new feature. The developersshould be able to look at a problem from the user's perspective and discuss abstract concepts with fellow developers. 

Job requirements
- Language: fluent English is mandatory, German is a plus
- Working experience: any 
- Education: EU citizens/residence holders ‚Äì any; others have to have a University degree (starting from Bachelor) so we can sponsor the work permit.

- We accept different profiles for C++ developer position, disregarding the former specialization and years of experience. For us, it is more important to evaluate the programming abilities rather than a nice resume and past projects. As all our recruitment steps are task-based, the selection of the candidates based only on the results demonstrated during the tests. We actually have several developers who joined us right after university graduation without any previous working experience.

About the company 
The company was established in 2002 and now has over 40 employees from 17 countries. Company is the leading data visualization software for business presentations. Our challenge is to offer the most intuitive user interface for generating complex data-driven charts and slides, while at the same time ensuring consistency, accuracy and seamless integration with Microsoft Office. We save time for our customers by automating many tasks for them, like chart labeling or slide layout. More than 750,000 users worldwide (such as American Express, Coca-Cola, Deloitte Consulting, Ernst & Young, Google, Hewlett-Packard, Nokia, Porsche Consulting, etc.) rely on our software for their daily business.

Position description
- Location: Berlin, Germany 
- Position: full-time, no remote or freelancer work 
- Number of vacancies: 5-10 employees
- Salary: 75 000-120 000 ‚Ç¨ gross per year, after the 1st year - 120 000 ‚Ç¨ guaranteed
- Team size: 20 developers reporting directly to CTO
- We will support with the relocation and work permit if needed

Vacancy: VP of Marketing

Legionfarm lets casual gamers pay to hire the top 0.1% of players in online games, helps customers have more fun playing, learn to be a better gamer, and conquer difficult parts of video games.
Over the past year, Legionfarm organized over 400,000 gaming sessions with our 7,000+ pros. At the moment, our team has 85+ people. Part of the team works remotely, while the other part is located in San Francisco, Singapore, Moscow, and Akademgorodok offices.
Funded by Y Combinator, Twitch co-founder and dozens of VCs and Angels.

What you will be doing:
- Take on work with earned & owned media.
- Work with our CMO to identify and achieve short and long-term goals of the marketing department.

Approximate profile of an ideal candidate for this position:
- Earned, paid, and owned channels are not new to you. Previously, you created and optimized such processes quickly and systematically.
- Bloggers || streamers || YouTubers || integrations - you used to do it in large volumes with a positive ROI.
- On our platform, more than a thousand professional players who can create content themselves while working for our customers. We want to control and systematize this process so that their content turns into money. You have probably managed hundreds of micro influencers before or just know how to work with massive Ops in marketing.
- An experienced manager who led more than one team and achieved success. You are longing to grow in a rapidly growing startup in the US market.
- Very strong in analytics, mathematical mindset. It‚Äôs important to us that you know how to build logical interconnections using numbers and communicate using numbers within the company. 
- You love and understand the gaming industry, and play games yourself. This is necessary to communicate with users, after all, this will be a huge part of your job. 
- You know how to work in companies that are in the lead. In companies that are market trendsetters. Those who are first to scout difficult places, and in conditions of uncertainty, launch businesses there. 
- Energetic, proactive. Structural thinker, understand how to prioritize thoughts. 
- You always measure success in money and consider it your primary goal to ensure company growth every month.
- The entire team is working on one KPI - revenue. 

Another important thing: members of our team already had several cashouts. There is an option program that applies to your role. We expect you to make a significant contribution to the growth of the company and mean that if successful, after a few years you will cash out your shares. But this is not only about money - we are disrupting the gaming industry, creating new jobs in video games.

If you already work somewhere and you like everything, but at the same time understand that this vacancy is about you, just come and have a chat. We will share insights and be friends.

As a response, we prepared:
A company that is 4 years old, we generate 8-digit $ revenue annually. 
Our mentors and partners are founders of Twitch, top managers at Google US, Uber US, and other good companies. We are a Y Combinator backed company, so you can access almost any industry experts you want.
There are 85+ people in the team. These are middle, senior, and senior+ level guys that are coming from large companies and startups, they are charged with one common idea of in-game jobs and move forward head-on.

At the moment, we operate in almost all markets, except Asia. We are being used by pro-layers and clients from 50+ countries across the entire world. Our focus and main market is USA.
We have freedom of speech/used channels/resources, let's discuss the degree of freedom!
